text: Abu Hassan Penchuri (English: Abu Hassan The Thief) is a 1955 Singaporean movie. It's a black-and-white romance and fantasy movie. It was directed by B. N. Rao and features P. Ramlee, Mariam Baharum, and Nordin Ahmad. ==Cast== * P. Ramlee as Abu Hassan * Mariam Baharum (aka Tahi Lalat) as Puteri Faridah * Nordin Ahmad as Putera Raja Tartar * Mohd Hamid (Ahmad C) as Kassim * Daeng Idris as Bapa Puteri Faridah * Malik Sutan Muda * S. Shamsuddin * Ali Rahman * Shariff Dol * Wan Hazim * Habsah * Sarawan Singh ==Related pages== * P. Ramlee filmography ==References== ==Other websites== * *Abu Hassan Penchuri / 1955 - Filem Malaysia Category:Singaporean movies Category:Black-and-white movies
title: Abu Hassan Penchuri
